thread.title: Swaragini’s Helly Shah & Kumkum Bhagya’s Arjit Taneja In Devanshi!
thread.title_full: Swaragini’s Helly Shah & Kumkum Bhagya’s Arjit Taneja In Devanshi!

title: Swaragini’s Helly Shah & Kumkum Bhagya’s Arjit Taneja In Devanshi!
text: » Swaragini’s Helly Shah & Kumkum Bhagya’s Arjit Taneja In Devanshi! Swaragini’s Helly Shah & Kumkum Bhagya’s Arjit Taneja In Devanshi! The viewers might soon watch Swaragini actress Helly Shah and Kumkum Bhagya actor Arjit Taneja together on Colors’ show Devanshi. Updated: Thursday, February 16, 2017, 17:36   Colors' show Devanshi is all set to take a major leap. The audiences will witness a generation leap and the story will be changed completely. Apparently, there were reports that Swaragini's Helly Shah was in talks with the makers. There were also reports that Anuj Fakih might be seen on the show. If reports are to be believed, Helly will play the role of Devanshi, while Anuj will be seen as Sakshi (Devanshi's sister).Initially, Helly accepted that she was approached, but didn't confirm whether she was taking up the show or not. According to the latest reports, Helly will soon start shooting.Also, there are reports that Arjit Taneja, who was seen as Purab on Kumkum Bhagya , has been approached for the show. A source was quoted by an entertainment portal as saying, "After an extensive hunt, the makers have finalised on Arjit. He recently did a mock shoot with Helly and if things fall in place he will be signed to play the male protagonist."As per the reports, the hero is from the village but have a progressive mindset. He is against the Godwoman Kusum Sundari (Karuna Pandey). He fights against the ill practice. A love triangle will be seen as the hero will be loving Devanshi, unaware about the fact that her sister loves him! Well, we are sure Arjit and Helly will make a wonderful pair. Stay locked to this space for the latest updates...
